derived.dist_front: d_xy_r_x  (robot-frame forward distance to pallet center; subtract ~pallet_depth/2 to get distance to pallet front)
derived.lateral_err: y_err_obs * 0.5  (denormalize to meters; obs is clipped to [-1,1] => [-0.5m, +0.5m])
derived.yaw_err: atan2(sin_dyaw, cos_dyaw)  (full-range radians from cos/sin encoding)

normalization_notes.y_err_obs: raw_lateral_m / 0.5, clipped [-1, 1].  pallet center-line frame lateral error.
normalization_notes.yaw_err_obs: raw_yaw_rad / (15 * pi / 180), clipped [-1, 1].  pallet center-line frame yaw error.

coordinate_frame_notes: d_xy_r is in **robot frame** (x=forward, y=left). y_err_obs/yaw_err_obs are in **pallet center-line frame**.
